channel.title: The Trophy Podcast - The Rime Palace 01
channel.description:
The official Trophy Gold actual play series continues in The Trophy Podcast feed! The Rime Palace is a continuation of the story started in Hester's Mill (also available in the feed). This is co-production with ChimaeraCast, who were also the players in the game. The incursion was written by @Alexi_Sarge and Trophy Gold was created by @jesseross
It's an *excellent* AP, very entertaining. Enjoy!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/trophy-podcast/the-rime-palace-01

@jasoncordova wrote:

The official Trophy Gold actual play series continues in The Trophy Podcast feed! The Rime Palace is a continuation of the story started in Hester’s Mill (also available in the feed). This is co-production with ChimaeraCast, who were also the players in the game. The incursion was written by @Alexi_Sarge and Trophy Gold was created by @jesseross

It’s an excellent AP, very entertaining. Enjoy!

THE GAUNTLET

The Rime Palace 01

The Trophy Podcast is a podcast by Jason Cordova, Judd Karlman, and Rich Rogers.
